    A Quick Guide for the imputomics shiny app A Quick Guide on imputomics

minimum imputation.

Source: R/impute-constant-column.R
impute_min.Rd

A function to replace NA in the data frame by minimum values.

Usage

impute_min(missdf)

Arguments

missdf

a data frame with missing values to be imputed containing features in columns and samples in rows.

Value

A data.frame with imputed values by minimum method.

Examples

data(sim_miss)
impute_min(sim_miss)
#>             X1         X2        X3           X4          X5         X6
